description:
Ikari is a Pokémon Ping-Pong player that is based off of the character Ryūichi Kazama / Dragon (風間 竜一/ドラゴン) from the sports manga Ping Pong. His personality is very competitive and he won a tournament in the Kalos region against Ilima.
He participated in a tournament in the Alola region where he was defeated in the finals by Ilima. He vowed to win the next time but told Ilima not to lose to anyone else.
name: Ikari
